Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Age|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Age:(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Age#AgeFHIR R5 ComplexType `Age` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `Age` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Age`.
Age.value (value):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Age#Age.valueElement `Age.value` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Age.value`.
Age.comparator (comparator):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Age#Age.comparatorNote that the target element context `Age.comparator` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `Age.comparator` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Age.comparator`.
Age.unit (unit):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Age#Age.unitElement `Age.unit` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Age.unit`.
Age.system (system):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Age#Age.systemElement `Age.system` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Age.system`.
Age.code (code):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Age#Age.codeElement `Age.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Age.code`.

name: ConceptMapR5AgeElementsForR4Age
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 ComplexType `Age` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions.
Element `Age` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Age`.
Element `Age.value` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Age.value`.

Note that the target element context `Age.comparator` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier.
Element `Age.comparator` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Age.comparator`.
Element `Age.unit` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Age.unit`.
Element `Age.system` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Age.system`.
Element `Age.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Age.code`.
